properties.areaDesc: Northern Wayne; Tioga; Steuben; Broome; Sullivan; Susquehanna; Delaware; Chemung
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 3:53AM EST until February 13 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of
1 to 3 inches, with higher amounts on the hilltops. A light
glaze of ice accumulation will also be possible.

* WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Susquehanna and Northern Wayne
counties. In New York, Steuben, Chemung, Tioga, Broome,
Delaware and Sullivan counties.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania
Turnpike Commission remind motorist to adjust speeds based on
driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania
roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadways,
and traffic conditions.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST THURSDAY
